title: What to believe -- and not to believe in the National League

title: Colts tab Jones as starting QB over Richardson
content: The Colts have named Daniel Jones as their starting QB, opting for the veteran over Anthony Richardson Sr.

title: Carr gets the keys: Irish name starting QB
content: Notre Dame redshirt freshman CJ Carr, grandson of former Michigan coach Lloyd Carr, has been named starting quarterback, beating out sophomore Kenny Minchey.

title: Flacco: 'Special' to be Browns starter at age 40
content: Joe Flacco said Tuesday that it is "definitely special" to be named the Cleveland Browns' starting quarterback as he enters his 18th NFL season.

title: Sources: Bachmeier makes BYU history as QB1
content: BYU is naming Bear Bachmeier as the Cougars' starting quarterback, sources told ESPN, which will make him the first true freshman in school history to start an opener for BYU.

title: French soccer team removes players after spat
content: Adrien Rabiot and Jonathan Rowe have been told they will never play for Marseille again after being involved after a post-match bust-up.

title: Sources: Sun eye options to salvage record sale
content: Connecticut Sun ownership intends to present multiple options to the WNBA as it looks to salvage what would have been a record-breaking $325 million franchise sale, sources told ESPN.

title: Scheffler's caddie returns for Tour Championship
content: Scottie Scheffler's regular caddie, Ted Scott, will return to the No. 1 overall golfer's bag for this week's Tour Championship.

title: ðŸ‘€ Indiana's mascot resurrected after 50 years!
content: Indiana's original bison mascot was described as "the devil with a cheerleader in it" -- but now a new version has risen from the ashes thanks to a passionate professor, underground student government action, a campus bar and more.

title: Barnwell picks five NFL teams set to decline: Who could miss the playoffs entirely?
content: Which teams will take a step back and lose more games this season? We made five picks based on troubling signs, offseason subtractions and more.

content: Never one to back down, Diego Pavia has made a name for himself in Nashville -- and he's not done yet.

content: Important milestones to watch ahead of the 2025-26 season, including another historic season from LeBron James and Nikola Jokic.

content: Atlanta will be pressure-tested against the league's best teams this week, starting with a red-hot Las Vegas.

title: 'We know how to weather storms': How the Aces saved their season
content: Las Vegas, .500 at the All-Star break, has won seven straight and is vying to host early WNBA playoff games.

content: From Lionel Messi to Son Heung-Min, how do MLS teams know when signing a close-to-retirement star from Europe is a good idea?

title: What early issues need solving for some top Premier League clubs?
content: The first matchday of the Premier League is over, so what did some of the top clubs learn from it? Arsenal need to fix their press, while Chelsea could play Cole Palmer out wide.

content: The Browns have a Week 1 starter, but the clock to begin finding their long-term quarterback solution continues.

content: Can anyone keep up with the Bills in the AFC East? Here are all the odds for each team in the division and our favorite bets.

title: A quest to understand the Carlos Alcaraz/Emma Raducanu ship
content: Carlos Alcaraz and Emma Raducanu say they're just friends. But a growing group of their fans is rooting for far more than just a US Open mixed doubles title. Welcome to the world of tennis shippers.

title: Answering the biggest questions facing Keegan Bradley with six U.S. Ryder Cup spots left
content: Will Bradley choose himself to play at ? Who are locks to make the team? We answer some of the biggest questions with six captain's picks left to fill out the team.

title: Jalen Brunson, Natalia Bryant star together in new Nike Kobe sneaker ad
content: A key feature of the new Nike Kobe 3 Protro is diamond shapes on the upper and outsole in honor of Natalia.

content: Vick is coaching just 30 miles from where he grew up, and in the state where he electrified college football as a player.

content: After visits with 10 NFL teams in eight states, Ben Solak compiled the best things he heard -- and saw -- throughout the trip.

title: NWSL Power Rankings: San Diego becomes KC's closest challenger
content: Kansas City is all alone out front, but the fight for second? That's headed by San Diego in ESPN's latest NWSL Power Rankings.

content: As Real Madrid's new manager, Alonso will soon be exposed to the eccentricities of refereeing in LaLiga.

title: Transfer rumors, news: Man United eye Lammens, as Inter chase Onana
content: Manchester United could look to Antwerp goalkeeper Senne Lammens as Inter Milan consider a reunion with AndrÃ© Onana. Transfer Talk has the latest news, gossip and rumors.

title: Moses Itauma makes massive impression at heavyweight
content: Itauma's quick finish of Dillian Whyte on Saturday elevates him in top 10. Here are the latest ESPN rankings in all weight classes.

title: India Clears Rs 62,000-Crore Deal To Buy 97 Tejas Mark 1A Fighter Jets
content: In a major boost for Prime Minister Narendra Modi's Make in India in defence project, India on Tuesday cleared the project for buying 97 LCA Mark 1A fighter jets for the Indian Air Force.

title: Mumbai Monorail With 582 Passengers Gets Stuck Amid Heavy Rain, All Rescued
content: A monorail train broke down in Mumbai this evening amid heavy rain, stranding hundreds of passengers for nearly three hours.

title: In Big Breakthrough, India, China To Seek Early Solution To Boundary Delimitation
content: In a big breakthrough in ties between the countries, India and China have decided to work on a settlement of the boundary question and an expert group will be set up to explore an early solution to boundary delimitation.

title: For Veep Battle, Revanth Reddy's Challenge To Andhra, Telangana Parties
content: The NDA move to pick a Tamil leader as its Vice-Presidential candidate -- in another effort to play the Tamil card -- appears to have led its southern allies into a dilemma as the Opposition INDIA bloc came up with an equally strong response.

title: Vijay's TVK Invokes CN Annadurai, MG Ramachandran Ahead Of Party's Madurai Meet
content: As TVK gears up for its conference in Madurai on August 21, the party is making a pointed political statement by invoking the legacies of DMK founder CN Annadurai and AIADMK founder MG Ramachandran.

title: 9-Year-Old Boy Stoned By Teen In Ireland, Family Calls It Racist Attack
content: A 9-year-old boy of Indian origin was attacked by a 15-year-old while he was playing, in Ireland. The teenager threw stones and injured him, on Tuesday in Cork County. The child suffered serious head injuries and was admitted to the hospital.

title: Video: Mumbai Monorail Stuck, Personnel Break Windows To Rescue Passengers
content: A rake of the Mumbai monorail lost power and got stuck in the same spot for over 90 minutes, leaving 442 passengers stranded.

title: 30-Year-Old Finnish MP Dies By Suicide Inside Parliament Building: Report
content: A Finnish lawmaker on Tuesday allegedly died by suicide inside Helsinki's Parliament House, the local media reported.

title: Mumbai Rain News Live Updates: All Passengers Rescued From Stranded Monorail, Red Alert Tomorrow
content: Mumbai Rains LIVE News: Heavy rainfall led to waterlogging on roads, and delayed flights and trains, with a red alert in place till Wednesday.

title: Mobile Internet Suspended in 2 Haryana Districts Amid Unrest Over Teacher's Death
content: Amid widespread public outrage over the death of a 19-year-old teacher, the Haryana government ordered the suspension of mobile internet, and bulk SMS and dongle services, in Bhiwani and Charkhi Dadri districts.

title: Nirmala Sitharaman Likely To Place GST Rate Overhaul Proposal Tomorrow
content: Finance Minister Nirmala Sitharaman is likely to present the Centre's proposal for rationalising goods and services tax (GST) rates before a Group of Ministers (GoM) at a two-day meeting starting August 20 in the national capital.

title: NCERT Introduces 2 Special Modules On Operation Sindoor For Classes 3 To 12
content: The NCERT has introduced two special modules on the Operation Sindoor for classes 3 to 12 describing the mission not just as a military operation but a promise to protect peace and honour the lives lost in the Pahalgam terror attack.

title: Australia Chides Israel After Diplomats' Visas Revoked
content: Australia's foreign minister criticised Israel for revoking visas held by Canberra's diplomatic representatives to the Palestinian Authority.

title: Chinese Refiners Sweep Up Russian Oil After Indian Demand Falls: Analysts
content: Chinese refineries have purchased 15 cargoes of Russian oil for October and November delivery as Indian demand for Moscow's exports falls away, two analysts and one trader said on Tuesday.

title: "Keen On Sports But Does Not Play Games In Politics": PM Modi On NDA's Veep Pick
content: Addressing an NDA parliamentary party meeting where Radhakrishnan was felicitated, Modi recalled his almost four-decade-long association with the former Tamil Nadu BJP president

title: Mumbai Local Trains Hit Hard As Rains Pound City, Commuters Stranded
content: Commuters faced severe hardship on Tuesday as local train services of the Central Railway were disrupted on its main and harbour lines due to submergence of tracks after torrential rains in Mumbai.

title: Not South Vs South, It's About  Country: Opposition Veep Candidate Reddy
content: India bloc's Vice-Presidential candidate, Retired Justice Sudarshan Reddy, arrived in New Delhi this evening after the formal announcement of his candidature.

title: Floodgates Of Bhakra Dam Opened, Likely To Inundate Villages
content: After the Pong dam, floodgates of the Bhakra dam were opened on Tuesday for the first time in this season after heavy rains in catchment areas had alarmingly increased the water level in the reservoir, a senior official said.

title: 12-Year-Old Boy Falls To Death From Rooftop While Flying Kite In Delhi: Cops
content: A 12-year-old boy died after falling from the terrace of his four-storey house while flying a kite in southeast Delhi's Zakir Nagar area, an officer said on Tuesday.

title: PM Modi, Chinese Foreign Minister Wang Yi Meet Ahead Of SCO Summit
content: Prime Minister Narendra Modi met Chinese Foreign Minister Wang Yi today at his residence, 7 Lok Kalyan Marg, in New Delhi, as India-China tensions continue to thaw.

title: India-China ties: Both sides to explore 'early harvest' on boundary delimitation; expert group to be set up
content: India and China have agreed to enhance border dispute resolution efforts following talks between NSA Ajit Doval and Chinese Foreign Minister Wang Yi. An Expert Group will be established under the WMCC to expedite boundary delimitation. Both sides committed to a fair and mutually acceptable settlement, improved border management, and new mechanisms for de-escalation.

title: Overcrowding, power glitch: Why Mumbai monorail got stuck? Over 400 rescued
content: In Mumbai, a monorail carrying over 400 passengers broke down between stations due to overcrowding during torrential rains, leading to a three-hour stranding. Rescue operations were promptly initiated by BMC, fire department, and police, ensuring the safe evacuation of all passengers, with some taken to hospitals as a precaution.

title: RIC optics & oil leverage: Why is India calm amid trade storm
content: In response to Washington's oil-linked tariffs, India is strategically recalibrating its diplomatic approach. By reviving the Russia-India-China troika and engaging with both Moscow and Beijing, India signals its commitment to strategic autonomy. While prioritizing dialogue and exploring alternative markets, India aims to navigate the tariff challenges without compromising its long-term geopolitical interests.

title: Apple's big India move: All iPhone 17 models Made in India for US; Trump could be reason why
content: Apple is set to manufacture all iPhone 17 models in India before their September launch, a first for the company, including the Pro versions. This shift, driven by tariff concerns and geopolitical tensions, aims to fulfill most US iPhone demand from India. Tata Group will produce half of India's iPhones, boosting exports which reached $7.

title: Asia Cup snub: Shreyas Iyer given fresh backing - 'There is no doubt in my mind'
content: Despite Shreyas Iyer's strong IPL performance and upcoming Asia Cup, selectors omitted him from the squad. Irfan Pathan strongly believes Iyer will return to the T20 team and become a leader. Iyer's impressive post-T20 World Cup stats include 949 runs in 26 matches, averaging 49.94 with a 179.73 strike rate, highlighting his potential impact.

title: Gaming Bill: Centre to ban money-based online gaming - Key details
content: The Union Cabinet has approved a bill to regulate online real-money gaming platforms, addressing concerns about gambling, addiction, and inconsistent state regulations. The bill seeks to establish a uniform legal framework, criminalize online betting, and impose strict penalties on offenders, while differentiating real-money gaming from eSports and social online games.

title: â€˜Rockets to Wall Streetâ€™: Muskâ€™s teen prodigy leaves SpaceX; joins Citadel Securities
content: Kairan Quazi, the 16-year-old prodigy who previously worked at SpaceX, is now joining Citadel Securities as a developer in New York City. He chose the quantitative trading firm over AI labs and big tech companies, drawn to the fast-paced environment and intellectual challenges. Quazi will be working on global trading infrastructure, embracing Wall Street's meritocratic culture.

title: Asia Cup: 'Sanju Samson will sit out' - Former India batter makes bold claim
content: Aakash Chopra suggests Shubman Gill's inclusion likely sidelines Sanju Samson for the Asia Cup, with selectors prioritizing batting slots. While Agarkar emphasizes the captain and coach will decide the final XI, Suryakumar Yadav praised Jitesh Sharma's growth, potentially favoring him. Samson's place in the playing XI remains uncertain despite his squad inclusion, creating a nervous wait.

title: Big â€˜Make in Indiaâ€™ boost! IAF to get 97 LCA Mark 1A fighter jets; details here
content: India has approved the acquisition of 97 LCA Mark 1A fighter aircraft for the Indian Air Force, boosting the 'Make in India' initiative. This follows an earlier order of 83 aircraft and aims to replace the MiG-21 fleet.

title: NCERT releases special module on Operation Sindoor
content: NCERT introduced a module on Operation Sindoor for classes 3-12. The module describes Operation Sindoor as "not just a military operation but a promise to protect peace and honour the lives lost."

title: CEO who laid off 80% employees globally for refusing to adopt AI
content: IgniteTech CEO Eric Vaughan replaced nearly 80% of his workforce in 2023 after employees resisted the company's AI adoption mandate. Despite investing in AI education, widespread resistance, particularly from technical staff, led to mass personnel changes. This drastic restructuring yielded significant returns, with the company launching AI solutions and maintaining high profit margins.

title: â€˜Just profiteeringâ€™: Trump admin's fresh salvo on India for Russian oil
content: US Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent criticized India's Russian oil purchases, deeming it "arbitrage" and accusing them of profiteering by reselling refined products.

title: 'To deepen all-weather partnership': Chinese FM wraps up India visit; heads to Pak next
content: Following his Delhi visit, Chinese Foreign Minister Wang Yi is heading to Pakistan for strategic talks, highlighting the enduring China-Pakistan alliance amidst growing US-Pakistan engagement. In Delhi, Wang met PM Modi, emphasizing border peace and fair resolution. China aims to maintain friendly ties with both India and Pakistan, hoping for solutions to their issues and offering constructive support.

title: Zelenskyy unleashes thank-o-meter diplomacy on second visit to Oval Office - here's why
content: Volodymyr Zelenskyy thanked Donald Trump repeatedly during a White House visit. This came after criticism for not showing enough appreciation previously. Zelenskyy also thanked European leaders for their support. Trump reciprocated with his own expressions of gratitude.

title: Tyson Bagent shocks Chicago as Bears tout NFLâ€™s best QB duo
content: Tyson Bagent, the underdog quarterback, stole the show at Chicago Bears' preseason game. He threw for 205 yards and a touchdown. Bagent's performance highlighted his potential. Coach Ben Johnson praised his confidence and decision-making. Bagent's rise provides the Bears with valuable quarterback depth. His success has transformed him from a fan favorite to a legitimate threat.

title: Ex-Panthers star urges Team Canada to join Crosby, McDavid at 4 Nations
content: Brandon Montour aims for a spot on Team Canada for the 2026 Winter Olympics. After winning the Stanley Cup, he is eager to represent his nation. Montour missed the 4 Nations roster but is determined to prove his worth. He attended Canadaâ€™s Olympic orientation camp. He hopes to play alongside Sidney Crosby and Connor McDavid.

title: French streamer Jean Pormanove dies at 46, fans outraged
content: French streamer Jean Pormanove, known for his extreme IRL broadcasts, tragically died at 46, sparking grief and outrage. His death followed a grueling Kick marathon, raising concerns about unsafe streaming culture. Fans are sharing disturbing clips, igniting debate on platform accountability and creator safety in the face of toxic content.

title: 'Train overcrowded': Monorail breaks down, stuck between 2 stations; all passengers rescued
content: Mumbai's Monorail experienced a breakdown between Chembur and Bhakti Park stations amidst heavy rains, stranding approximately 200 passengers. Chief Minister Fadnavis assured a safe evacuation and ordered an inquiry into the incident. Overcrowding due to suspended local train services exacerbated the situation, prompting rescue operations by various agencies to ensure passenger safety and medical assistance.

title: When 1 MiG beat 4 US fighter jets: IAF jet prepares for touchdown after 6-decade service
content: Air Marshal Prithvi Singh Brar recounts his experiences flying the MiG-21, highlighting its crucial role in the 1971 Indo-Pak War and its significance as a training platform for generations of IAF pilots. Despite its eventual 'flying coffin' tag, Brar remembers the MiG-21 with fondness, emphasizing its reliability and the skills it instilled in pilots.

title: India Asia Cup 2025 squad vs last T20I XI: Key changes, inclusions, and omissions - more inside
content: India announce its 15-member squad for the Asia Cup 2025, retaining Suryakumar Yadav as captain and promoting Shubman Gill to vice-captain. The squad sees the return of Jasprit Bumrah and includes fresh faces like Harshit Rana and Jitesh Sharma. While a strong core from the victorious England series remains, notable omissions include Mohammed Shami, Shreyas Iyer and Yashasvi Jaiswal.

title: US revokes thousands of student visas over 'crimes': New legal grey zone for â€˜outsiders'
content: In 2025, the Trump administration revoked over 6,000 student visas, citing alleged criminal activity and terrorism links, but the implications go deeper. The shift from conviction-based revocations to data-driven suspicion has blurred legality with perception. For many students, especially from India, China, and Iran, academic merit now coexists with heightened scrutiny, self-censorship, and conditional belonging in US academia.

title: 'Khada hoon aaj bhi wahin': Nadda mocks Rahul's 'vote chori' claim; shares video
content: BJP president JP Nadda has criticized Rahul Gandhi's "vote chori" claims, sharing a video alleging it's a "scripted PR" stunt. The video features a woman retracting her complaint about missing names from the voter list. Amit Malviya also attacked Rahul after a psephologist admitted to incorrect voter data, demanding an apology for targeting the Election Commission.

title: Into the storm: US Air Force plane flies straight into eye of Hurricane Erin - watch
content: The US Air Force captured dramatic footage flying into Hurricane Erin's eye, revealing a calm center amidst the storm. Erin rapidly intensified from a Category 1 to a Category 5 hurricane, shocking forecasters. While currently far from land, its path is monitored due to potential shifts, with coastal regions urged to stay alert for possible impacts.

title: Asia Cup 2025: Ajit Agarkar finally reveals why Gill gets vice-captaincy â€“ details inside
content: Ajit Agarkar explained the Asia Cup 2025 squad selection. Shreyas Iyer will miss out due to squad composition. Shubman Gill is the vice-captain, replacing Axar Patel. Gill's performance in England impressed selectors. Suryakumar Yadav will lead the team. Abhishek Sharma's bowling ability secured his place over Yashasvi Jaiswal. The Asia Cup 2025 will start on September 9 in the UAE.

title: What Mumbai rains did to city - 10 videos that show havoc
content: Maharashtra is grappling with severe flooding due to incessant rains, claiming at least six lives and displacing hundreds. Mumbai and other districts are on high alert as the IMD forecasts more intense rainfall. Authorities are evacuating vulnerable areas, with the NDRF and Army assisting in rescue operations. Farmland is submerged, and infrastructure is severely damaged, disrupting connectivity across the state.

title: Russia sets major rider for 'long-term peace' deal, day after Zelenskyy-Trump meet
content: Russia stated firmly that any lasting peace agreement with Ukraine must address the security concerns of Russia and the rights of Russian-speaking people in Ukraine. This declaration followed discussions between Zelenskyy and Trump, where Trump indicated he would consult with Putin after their meeting.

title: Asia Cup 2025: No Rishabh Pant in Indiaâ€™s squad - Here is why
content: Rishabh Pant's fractured foot rules him out of the Asia Cup 2025, solidifying Sanju Samson's position as the primary wicketkeeper. Jitesh Sharma has been included as the second option. Pant's recent struggles, including a poor IPL season, further impacted his chances. The final decision on the wicketkeeper will depend on the team's batting strategy.

title: 'Next 48 hours crucial': Maha CM sounds alert; rescue personnel gear up as toll rises to 8
content: Mumbai was brought to a standstill due to torrential rainfall, causing widespread flooding and disrupting transportation networks. The heavy downpour, which accounted for a significant portion of the city's monthly average, led to submerged areas, railway track inundation, and flight disruptions.

title: India Womenâ€™s ODI WC 2025 squad:No place for Shafali Verma - hereâ€™s why
content: Shafali Verma's recent poor form led to her exclusion from India's 15-member squad for the upcoming Women's World Cup, as announced by selectors. Harmanpreet Kaur will captain the team, aiming for their first World Cup title. Medium-pace bowler Renuka Thakur returns after injury, and India will prepare with ODIs against Australia.

title: 'India will be ...': What BJP said on impact of Trump's tariff; cites local consumption
content: The BJP downplayed the impact of US tariffs on India, emphasizing the nation's strong domestic consumption, contributing significantly to its GDP. Syed Zafar Islam highlighted India's resilience amidst global economic challenges, contrasting it with higher inflation rates in the US and UK. He credited PM Modi's policies for strengthening India's economy, citing positive outlooks from international rating agencies.

title: 'Ghuspaithiya Bachao Yatra': BJP targets Rahul's 'Voter Adhikar Yatra' after Psephologist's apology
content: BJP has strongly criticized Rahul Gandhi for his "vote theft" allegations, following Sanjay Kumar's admission of incorrect voter data related to Maharashtra elections. BJP accuses Gandhi of using false figures to push a narrative against the Election Commission. Malviya demands an apology from Rahul, calling his yatra a scheme to protect infiltrators after Kumar apologized for the misleading claims.

title: Opted for new income tax regime? Donâ€™t stop putting money in these investments
content: While the new income tax regime eliminates many deductions, some tax-saving investments remain crucial. PPF's tax-free returns and term insurance's risk coverage are still valuable. Health insurance protects against medical inflation, and employer-linked NPS contributions offer tax benefits. However, ELSS should be replaced with diversified equity funds, and traditional insurance policies should be re-evaluated.

title: Toronto Maple Leafsâ€™ Matthew Knies attends Grant Cruikshank and McKennaâ€™s wedding in Wisconsin
content: Toronto Maple Leafs forward Matthew Knies joined the celebration of his former Minnesota Gophers teammate, Grant Cruikshank, who married McKenna in Wisconsin. The wedding added to a memorable offseason for Knies, who has balanced time with family and friends while preparing for the upcoming NHL season. His presence highlighted the strong ties formed during his college hockey career.

title: With Pakistan out over security: Hockey Asia Cup 2025 in India from Aug 29; full schedule
content: India are set to clash with China in their opening match of the Hockey Asia Cup 2025, scheduled for August 29 in Rajgir, Bihar. The tournament not only crowns Asia's top team but also offers a coveted qualification spot for the FIH Hockey World Cup Belgium-Netherlands 2026. Eight teams will compete, with the final slated for September 7.

title: Vote Adhikar Yatra: Rahul Gandhiâ€™s convoy 'crushes' cop - watch
content: The BJP has strongly criticized Congress leader Rahul Gandhi after a video surfaced allegedly showing his car running over a police constable during the 'Vote Adhikar Yatra' in Bihar. BJP spokesperson Shehzad Poonawalla shared the video, claiming the officer was critically injured and Gandhi did not stop to check on him.

title: Asia Cup: Shubman Gill is breathing down Suryakumar Yadav's neck
content: Shubman Gill's elevation to India's T20I vice-captain is a clear sign that he might end up leading the team instead of Suryakumar Yadav in the T20I World Cup at home. There are still seven months to go to the marquee event, and in Indian cricket, things can change in seven hours.

title: Airline-style baggage charges in trains? Railways to implement new strict luggage rules
content: Indian Railways is implementing stricter baggage rules, including weight checks at major stations like Prayagraj Junction, mirroring airline practices. Passengers exceeding weight limits will face extra charges, with allowances varying by travel class.

title: 'Will make Rahul PM': Tejashwi Yadav vows 2029 support; calls NDA govt in Bihar 'khatara'
content: Rashtriya Janata Dal leader Tejashwi Yadav appealed to Bihar voters. He wants them to support Congress leader Rahul Gandhi for Prime Minister in 2029. Yadav aims to defeat the National Democratic Alliance in the upcoming state elections. He criticized Chief Minister Nitish Kumar's government. Yadav accused the Bharatiya Janata Party of voter disenfranchisement.

title: No thanks: How Zelenskyy snubbed Trump by not suiting up
content: But Zelenskyy has spent the last three years rewriting that script. His wartime wardrobe is not an accident of comfort but a deliberate symbol. Sweatshirts, fatigues, and henleys have become part of Ukraineâ€™s frontline diplomacy, reminding the world at every summit that Kyiv is not hosting cocktail parties but fighting for survival.

title: Asia Cup 2025: India selectors continue to be unfair on Shreyas Iyer; one squad sheet at a time!
content: Indian cricket must keep the door open for Shreyas Iyer in white-ball formats, especially with the T20 World Cup at home next year. Though his inclusion at No. 3 adds more right-handers than Gautam Gambhir might prefer, Iyerâ€™s ability to anchor innings and adapt makes him indispensable. His presence balances flair with stability, making him a strong contender for a starting spot.

title: 'We finally feel acceptedâ€™: Gujarat village ends Dalit haircut ban
content: In a village in Banaskantha, a Dalit man received a haircut at a local barber shop for the first time, marking the end of a decades-long discriminatory practice. This change came after persistent efforts from the Dalit community, local activists, and intervention from the district administration.

title: NFC East betting preview: Can anyone overtake the Eagles?
content: no team has won the NFC East in back-to-back seasons since 2001-04 . the Dallas Cowboys are the third choice at +700, followed by the New York Giants . defending champions are -160 to do just that, with the Washington Commanders next in line at +225 .

title: Everything to know about the revamped -- and controversial -- US Open mixed doubles
content: the mixed doubles event runs concurrently with the main draw and the championship match is held during the final weekend . but this edition will be condensed into two days during qualifying week . the tournament also features an unprecedented number of top-ranked singles players .

title: Draft Guide: Rankings, mock drafts and analysis
content: this draft guide will serve as one-stop shop for all of our best fantasy football picks possible in every draft you're in . we have everything needed to help you draft a great team and start the season with a shot . it doesn't matter whether you have been doing this for years or are a first-timer .

title: 'A Wildcat GOAT': Beal, Towns lead reactions to John Wall retiring from NBA
content: the five-time NBA All-Star announced his retirement on tuesday . he spent 10 of his 13 professional seasons with the Washington Wizards . his last action in the league came during the 2022-23 campaign .

title: The little-known FIFA rule that gives Alexander Isak all the leverage over Newcastle
content: shaka Hislop thinks Alexander Isak may never be welcomed back into the side . the striker has been holding out after his club turned down a Â£110 million transfer bid from Liverpool . he thinks they could determine his future if they have knowledge of Article 17 .

title: MMA divisional rankings: Can any middleweight stop Khamzat Chimaev from taking top position?
content: Khamzat Chimaev becomes middleweight champion at the UFC 319 . he is undefeated and has long been expected to rise to the top . the middleweight rankings also saw two fighters enter the top 10 for the first time .

title: How 'A League of Their Own' started a feud between Madonna and Evansville, Indiana
content: EVANSVILLE, INDIANA, is one of America's biggest small towns . residents are proud of their town's resilience during the 1937 flood . they're proud of the city's role in world war II as a major manufacturing hub .

title: The stat that could swing every team's 2025-26 season
content: the new national TV calendar is taking shape . the new season schedule was unveiled this past week . training camps open in just over a month . there are plenty of reasons for the Hawks optimism this season . click here for all the latest NBA news .

title: Field's favorites: Jaylen Waddle, TreVeyon Henderson among popular draft targets
content: ESPN fantasy football's ultimate champ has a lot of mock drafts and real drafts . the column is not a reflection of the best players in fantasy football . it's not an reflection of players no one is talking about . if you're a fantasy football fan, you can be a fan of the game .

title: Itâ€™s finally time! Where is your team in our preseason Power Rankings?
content: the 2025 season is just around the corner, so it's time to reevaluate the outlooks for all 32 teams . our power panel of more than 30 writers and editors evaluate how NFL teams stack up against each other . check out how holdouts, breakouts and injuries have impacted our rankings .

title: Preseason Power Rankings: What to expect from each top-25 team
content: in just four days, the college football season kicks off with a week 0 matchup between no. 22 Iowa State and no. 17 Kansas State in Dublin . a lot of change has occurred since January . three of the top five teams in our initial power rankings have new starting quarterbacks .

title: Former NBA star Wall retires after 11 seasons
content: five-time All-Star point guard is retiring after 11 seasons in the NBA . he played most of his career with the Washington Wizards after they made him the first pick in the 2010 draft out of Kentucky . in his best season, he averaged 23.1 points and 10.7 assists for the Wizards in 2016-17 .

title: Waiver wire: Odyssey Sims steps up for depleted Fever backcourt
content: a long summer season is winding down . many teams have just this final week before the imaginary postseason begins next Monday . a rookie rising for the sun, as well as a vet taking on more work in the wake of injuries .

title: Nearly 800 rescued as two Mumbai monorails halt midway amid heavy rains, CM Fadnavis promises inquiry
content: Emergency response teams including MFB, Police, Monorail staff, and 108 ambulance services were mobilised at both sites

title: Justice Tiruvarur Muthuswami Iyer statue in Chennai: Remembering an icon of the Madras High Court
content: Justice Tiruvarur Muthuswami Iyer was the first Indian to be appointed as a judge of the Madras High CourtÂ in 1878

title: After CSDS psephologist deletes X post, BJP accuses Congress of making â€œbaseless claimsâ€ on voter fraud

title: Congress alleges â€˜vote theftâ€™ in 27 seats in 2023 Madhya Pradesh polls, claims 16 lakh voters added in 2 months
content: The Congress says 27 Assembly seats have been identified where the margin of victory was very narrow, but the number of newly added voters was far greater than this margin

title: Cotton import duty exemption a death warrant to farmers, says Samyukt Kisan Morcha
content: Union government maintains the decision is good for textile industries, will help stabilise cotton prices

title: Pollachi sexual assault case: survivors receive compensation ordered by trial court after three months
content: The trial court in its judgment on May 13 ordered a total compensation of â‚¹85 lakh to seven out of the eight survivors in the case

title: Cabinet panel on security clears project to procure 97 LCA Mark 1A fighter jets for IAF
content: A senior defence official terms the decision a major boost to governmentâ€™s Make in India initiative; the aircraft will be manufactured by Hindustan Aeronautics Limited

title: One seat reserved for SCs or STs on the boards of cooperative societies, says Amit Shah

title: Sudershan Reddyâ€™s candidature strengthens our collective resolve to safeguard democracy, says Stalin

title: Producers of Rajinikanth-starrer Coolie approach Madras High Court against â€˜Aâ€™ certification

title: Thiruvananthapuram Medical College Principal warns faculty against going public with allegations

title: â€˜Photojournalists play key role in providing information to public through picturesâ€™
content: More than 550 pictures from across the country were submitted in the photography contest conducted by APPJA and 50 of them were selected for various prizes, says CR Media Academy chairman

title: Bill for simultaneous elections gives unfettered powers to Election Commission of India, says former CJI Sanjiv Khanna
content: Khanna gives his opinion to a parliamentary committee reviewing the Bill; he says the clause that allows ECI to postpone Assembly polls may result in Centre taking over the reins of the State government; four former CJIs too had flagged the issue; committee to meet economists now

title: Nimisha Priya forum seeks action against evangelist Paul
content: Kanthapuram A.P. Aboobacker Musliar says he has contributed to Nimisha Priyaâ€™s reprieve from execution and the ball is now in Union governmentâ€™s court to facilitate her release from Yemen prison.

content: â€˜Why should only one community do these kinds of jobs? Seeking job permanency is not agreeable to me. I have a second opinion on this issue,â€™ says VCK leader
